title: "Aged Yrs" stretched serif on whiskey label
content:
It's so simple, too simple for me though :)  
Help please

author: byngo

comments.content: Try Century, Century Old Style etc. They’re nicer. Your sample might be a baskerville stretched up & down.
I think my choice of Georgia is closer although it's not perfect. Thanks anyway
Yeah, just remember to stretch it ; ). That ‘A’ is tricky.
